result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

3:08 PM Prosecuting attorney Adam Yale Gerol in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Scott Donald Minor Jr. appeared by video from the Ozaukee County jail, in custody.  Attorney Gordon R Leech in court for Scott Donald Minor Jr. Counsel previously filed plea questionnaire. Court examines Defendant, accepts change of plea to no contest, and finds Defendant guilty. State will recommend at sentencing: 30 years WSP 15 yrs IC 15 yrs ES. Court revokes bail.
Sentencing hearing scheduled for November 14, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
Sentencing hearing on November 14, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

2:46 PM Prosecuting attorney Antonella Aleman-Zientek appeared in court for the State of Wisconsin, Defendant Scott Donald Minor Jr. appeared by video from the Ozaukee County Jail, in custody. Attorney Cherella appears on 22CF26 only. Attorney Cherella advises State PD is waiting additional information for review prior to appointing counsel. 1:25 PM Prosecuting attorney Adam Yale Gerol appeared in court for the State of Wisconsin, Defendant Scott Donald Minor Jr. appeared by video.  Defendant acknowledges receipt of the complaint.  Court finds probable cause.  Defendant is represented by Atty Cherella on 22CF0063 and intends to hire counsel for this case as well.  State recommends $75,000 cash bail.  Court sets bail.  Court finds good cause to waive time and sets for status on preliminary hearing.
Status hearing scheduled for March 14, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
